name: Sebi's Random Tech - The Game
description:
This game was made for the July instalment of the HEJ game jam. The theme of the jam was “About Your favourite Youtuber”. I chose the Sebi’s Random Tech Youtube channel. I recommend his channel to everyone who is interested in tinkering with Thinkpads. I enjoy his content very much and learned a lot!

 

Links:

Sebi’s Random Tech

HEJ game jam - 2020 July

 

Assets:

Kenney Game Assets 2

Hyperlinks for TextMesh Pro

Music:

Happy Dreams by David Fesliyan
